toml-to-yaml.cardDescription: Convert TOML format to YAML format. Paste your TOML and get the YAML output.
toml-to-yaml.cardInputDescription: Paste the TOML you want to convert. We will validate it and then generate the YAML output.
toml-to-yaml.cardOutputDescription: This is the YAML representation of your TOML. You can copy it for further use.
toml-to-yaml.outputError: Invalid TOML format. Please check your input.
